description: The original full node implementation for the Zcash protocol, maintaining the entire blockchain state.
An independent, consensus-compatible Zcash node implementation written in Rust for better performance and security.
A backend service that provides a bandwidth-efficient interface to the Zcash blockchain for light clients (mobile wallets).
Provides instant access to Zcash nodes via API, allowing developers to build without maintaining their own infrastructure.
Blockchain-as-a-Service provider offering API connection to Zcash full nodes.
One of the largest and most reliable anonymous Zcash mining pools.
User-friendly Zcash mining pool with regular payouts and robust monitoring tools.
Digital payment network enabling instant, fraud-proof Zcash payments at major retailers.
Payment processor allowing businesses to accept Zcash and settle in fiat currency.
Non-custodial crypto payment gateway that supports Zcash for e-commerce and donations.
Institutional-grade custody solution and the prime custodian for Wrapped ZEC (WZEC).
Decentralized exchange allowing native cross-chain swaps (e.g., BTC to ZEC) without wrapping.
Automated coin swap service allowing quick conversion between Zcash and other assets.
Privacy-focused aggregator that can anonymize transactions using Monero or other routes.
